snippet: The Indian military may retaliate at a “time of its choosing” for the recent beheading of an Indian soldier by the Pakistani army, the chief of India’s army said.
abstract: The Indian military may retaliate at a “time of its choosing” for the recent beheading of an Indian soldier by the Pakistani army, the chief of India’s army said.

headline.main: India Could Retaliate Against Pakistan for Beheading, Army Chief Says
